sitemapList.title: Sitemaps
sitemapList.subtitle: Manage sitemaps to include them into index sitemap.xml

formSitemap.descriptionSitemapLocation: Sitemap location is the unique relative sitemap URL in context of index sitemap, i.e.: 'categories/electronics.xml', 'products.xml', etc. Requirements for sitemap path are the same to any URL. Please avoid of using 'sitemap.xml' in sitemap path.
formSitemap.sitemapIndexErrorMessage: Please avoid of using "sitemap.xml" as sitemap location
formSitemap.sitemapSitemapLocationExistErrorMessage: This sitemap location is already used
formSitemap.descriptionSitemapItemsLocation: To generate a sitemap item URL can be used the next patterns: {language} - will be replaced with language code (i.e. en-US), {slug} - will be replaced with SEO semantic URL part

sitemap.noSitemapsIemsMessage: There are no sitemap items yet

formCustomSitemapItem.descriptionUrlTemplate: The concrete relative URL  for custom items, i.e.: /about-us, /my-folder/my-page

confirmRemoveSitemap.title: Removing sitemaps
confirmRemoveSitemap.message: Do you want to remove sitemap?

confirmBaseUrl.title: Base URL
confirmBaseUrl.messageNoBaseUrl: Please enter a base URL for sitemaps
confirmBaseUrl.messageConfirmBaseUrl: Please confirm a base URL for sitemaps

errorMessages.filenameNotUnique: Sitemap with this filename is already exists
